identity.name: Lumina Gallery
identity.description: A high-performance, visually stunning image gallery that treats every upload like a piece of art. Clean lines, generous whitespace, and Swiss-style typography.

scale.caption: text-xs md:text-sm font-mono uppercase tracking-widest text-muted-foreground/80

colors.theme_strategy: Light Mode Default. High contrast black on white. 'Swiss Style' aesthetic.

Button.style: rounded-full px-8 py-6 font-medium tracking-wide transition-all duration-300 hover:scale-105 active:scale-95

Card.style: group relative overflow-hidden bg-card transition-all duration-500 hover:shadow-2xl border-0

Input.style: h-12 rounded-none border-b-2 border-input bg-transparent px-0 py-2 text-lg focus-visible:border-primary focus-visible:ring-0 placeholder:text-muted-foreground/50 transition-colors

Dialog.style: sm:max-w-[600px] border-0 shadow-2xl bg-background/95 backdrop-blur-xl p-0 overflow-hidden

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Install 'lucide-react' for icons. Use 'sonner' for toasts.
2. LAYOUT: Implement a responsive Masonry grid for the main gallery. Do NOT use a simple flex wrap. Use CSS columns (column-count-1 md:column-count-2 lg:column-count-3) for a true waterfall effect.
3. UPLOAD: Create a 'Drag & Drop' zone that feels premium. Use a dashed border that becomes solid and colored on drag-over. Show a progress bar for uploads.
4. VIEWER: The image viewer should be a full-screen modal with a blurred backdrop. The image should be 'contain' fit. Metadata (tags, date) should be minimal and placed at the bottom or side.
5. TYPOGRAPHY: Use 'Playfair Display' for the main 'Gallery' heading to give it an editorial feel. Use 'Manrope' for all UI text.
6. INTERACTIONS: Add hover effects to images - show a subtle gradient overlay with the 'Download' and 'Delete' buttons appearing on hover.
7. DATA-TESTID: Ensure every interactive element (buttons, inputs, cards) has a 'data-testid' attribute.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic gradients, no centered text blocks without purpose.
Spacing: Use generous padding (p-8, p-12). Don't cram content.
Motion: Add 'layout' prop to Framer Motion components for smooth reordering when filtering.
Accessibility: Ensure high contrast for text. Use aria-labels for icon-only buttons.
